references: A. P. Prudnikov, Yu. A. Brychkov and O.I. Marichev, "Integrals and Series", Volume 1: "Elementary Functions", Chapter 4: "Finite Sums", New York, Gordon and Breach Science Publishers, 1986-1992.
formula: a(n) = Sum(i^4 * binomial(n, i), i=1..n): binomial transform of A000583.G.f.:(x*(8*x^2-8*x-1))/(2*x-1)^5 [From Maksym Voznyy (voznyy(AT)mail.ru), Jul 26 2009]
author: Yong Kong (ykong(AT)curagen.com), Dec 26 2000
